landingPage.title: Welcome to Organizr.io!
landingPage.description: Organizr.io helps you organizing events your way.

share.title: Share this event

help.info: Write down a title and a short description for your event
help.calendar:
Select the potential dates the event may take place. Once a date is selected you may select times for the attendees to choose from.
You may type in the hour in short format like '115' in place of '01:15' and then press Enter to submit.
help.calendarViewer: Select the dates or times you would be able to attend the event.
help.place: Select the potential places the event may take place. Either select from the dropdown list provided once you start typing or press <kbd>Enter</kbd> to validate a custom location like 'At home'.
help.placeViewer: Select the places where you could go to attend the event.
help.checklist: Create a checklist of things to prepare for your event. Attendees will be able to assign some of the tasks to themselves.
help.checklistViewer: Here is what is needed for the event, feel free to assign a task or two for yourself by checking the box.
help.polls: You can create polls for the attendees to choose activities or themes etc.
help.pollsViewer: Please vote for the following poll(s).
